cards.name: Wunderkind Devising
cards.originalText:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may put a progress counter on Wunderkind Devising.
[PROGRESS 1+] At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put each artifact card from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
[PROGRESS 4+] Artifacts you control are artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5.

cards.name: Xanigan, the Darkened Cloud
cards.originalText:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Xanigan, the Darkened Cloud, you get an emblem with exalted.
[+2]: Xanigan deals 2 damage to up to one target and you gain 2 life.
[-3]: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
[-7]: Xanigan becomes a 7/7 Demon creature with flying and indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to her.
